mapper.insert: insert into account_info (account_id, account_key, account_secret, account_name, id_card, id_type, level, create_time, update_time, status) values (#{accountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountSecret,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{level,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.update: update account_info set account_key = #{accountKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, account_secret = #{accountSecret,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, account_name = #{accountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, id_card = #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, id_type = #{idType,jdbcType=CHAR}, level = #{level,jdbcType=CHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR} where account_id = #{accountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select account_id, account_key, account_secret, account_name, id_card, id_type, level, create_time, update_time, status from account_info where account_id = #{accountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select account_id, account_key, account_secret, account_name, id_card, id_type, level, create_time, update_time, status from account_info
